mapper.select: SELECT ro.order_code,ro.member_id,rog.barcode_id,rog.xnum,rog.retail_price,gm.only_coding,gm.goods_title,su.unit_name,pu.imgs_original FROM retail_order ro inner join retail_order_goods rog on ro.order_id=rog.order_id left join goods_barcode gb on rog.barcode_id=gb.barcode_id left join goods_spec gs on gb.goods_id=gs.goods_id left join goods_main gm on gs.g_m_id=gm.g_m_id left join sys_units su on gm.unit_id=su.sys_unit_id left JOIN pt_uimgs pu on gm.pic_id = pu.imgs_id where ro.order_code=#{orderId}
select rop.pay_method,rop.pay_money,rop.discount_money,rop.pay_code,rop.pay_serial_no from retail_order_pays rop where rop.order_code=#{orderId}
